title: You know you have been playing too much Yasuo when:

replies.body: All I see here is an Avatar who has a lot to learn before he's ready save the world.

> [{quoted}](name=Catastrop,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wAR9RFtg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-05-14T01:57:20.395+0000)
>
> All I see here is an Avatar who has a lot to learn before he's ready save the world.

I know you weren't going for the exact quote, but this stuff hurts me so...
>All I can see here is an Avatar who has a lot to learn before he's ready save anyone, but I believe [he] can save the world.
You know you've been playing too much Yasuo when you play a match on Yasuo.
Retardness is like the wind, always by my side.

He's not the Avatar...but he is the Air Apparent.

*gets bad looks*  I'll get me coat...
